description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
Release Notes
New Features
- Added Max and Average options for CPU Frequency in Sensor settings.
- Added GPU selection switch in Sensor settings.
- Added automatic fallback to iGPU when dGPU is disconnected for sensor readings.
- Added the ability to swap dashboards when enabling or disabling without restarting.
Bug Fixes
- Fixed an issue where logs were printed in the wrong order.
- Fixed an issue where Sensor Settings window did not correctly apply default options.
- Fixed an issue where the dashboard refresh interval menu was not displayed.
- Fixed an issue where the ComboBox did not display scrollbars properly.
UI & Behavior Changes
- Moved all sensor reading logic and UI behind the Hardware Sensors setting.
- Updated:
  - Use New Sensor Dashboard card and window
  - Enable Floating Gadget card and window
  - Edit Arguments card and window
  - Sensor Settings card and window
- Removed hardcoded WindowBackdropType usage.
- Improved dashboard switching behavior without requiring restart.
Localization
- Updated localization files.
- Added missing localization keys and values.
- Removed orphaned localization keys.
